overview:
As president and CEO , Butch is responsible for setting the companyâ€™s strategic direction, as well as evangelizing PlanetEyeâ€™s unique value proposition.

Prior to joining PlanetEye, Butch was president and CEO with Truition Inc. During his four-year tenure, Truition was named to the 2007 Deloitte Technology Fast 50, which ranks the 50 fastest-growing technology companies in Canada, by achieving impressive five-year revenue growth of 565%.

Butch led Truitionâ€™s expansion into the U.K. and Germany, which let him explore many parts of Europe as part of his day-to-day activities. These travels and the challenges encountered during initial visits to these cities now play a key role in PlanetEyeâ€™s strategic vision.

Prior to Truition, Butch was the president and chief financial officer with BuyBuddy Inc., a Web and wireless comparative shopping destination. He also has experience working in the larger business world having been VP, finance and operations for Rogers New Media, Canadaâ€™s largest integrated media company. Butch also spent five years in senior financial management roles with Stentor, the official alliance organization of the Canadian national telephone companies.
